briefdescription.para: IPCT shortcuts.
IPCT interrupts.
Function for triggering the specified IPCT task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task to be triggered.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the specified IPCT task register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Specified task.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified task register.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the specified IPCT event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to clear.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of the IPCT event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event to be checked.
The event has been generated.
The event has not been generated.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting the address of the specified IPCT event register.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Specified event.

simplesect.para: Address of the specified event register.

briefdescription.para: Function for enabling specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be enabled.
Mask of interrupts to be enabled. Use nrf_ipct_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for disabling specified interrupts.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be disabled.
Mask of interrupts to be disabled. Use nrf_ipct_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for checking if the specified interrupts are enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be checked.
Mask of interrupts to be checked. Use nrf_ipct_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for retrieving the state of pending interrupts.

detaileddescription.para: States of pending interrupt are saved as a bitmask. One set at particular position means that interrupt for event is pending.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Index of interrupt group to be retrieved.

simplesect.para: Bitmask with information about pending interrupts. Use nrf_ipct_int_mask_t values for bit masking.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the DPPI subscribe configuration for a given IPCT task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to set the configuration.
DPPI channel through which to subscribe events.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the DPPI subscribe configuration for a given IPCT task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Task for which to clear the configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for setting the DPPI publish configuration for a given IPCT event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to set the configuration.
DPPI channel through which to publish the event.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing the DPPI publish configuration for a given IPCT event.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
Event for which to clear the configuration.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting value of the task overflow status for SEND task.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the structure of registers of the peripheral.
SEND task index to be checked.
Task overflow has happened.
Task overflow has not happened.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting SEND task by its index.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the SEND task.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting ACK task by its index.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the ACK task.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting RECEIVE event by its index.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the RECEIVE event.

briefdescription.para: Function for getting ACKED event by its index.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the ACKED event.
